name: Chiikawa x Converse Backpack (Navy)
description:
Chiikawa×CONVERSE outing collaboration Bag is here!
Using high-density, high-quality polyester material, this collaboration item is printed with an original graphic of “Chiikawa×CONVERSE” where “Chiikawa”, “Hachiware”, and “Usagi” peek out from the anchor patch, making it a daypack that stands out in both a cool and casual style.
The unique design includes features like the fascinator handle of “Star” and the total pattern lining scattered with “Chiikawa” and its companions, incorporating the essence of “Chiikawa” throughout.
It boasts exceptional usability with a front pocket and side pocket that offer ample storage capacity, a PC pocket with cushion material, and a mesh pocket inside.
The size is neither too big nor too small, making it perfect for commuting, school, and suitable for everyone from children to adults, regardless of gender.

Size: Approximately H400×W260×D170mm
Material: Polyester
Manufactured in: China

name: Chiikawa x Converse Backpack (Beige)
description:
Chiikawa×CONVERSE outing collaboration Bag is here!
Using high-quality polyester material with high density, the design is based on a daypack that fits both casual and dressy styles, with “Chiikawa”, “Hachiware”, and “Usagi” peeking out from the ankle patch of the original graphic of “Chiikawa×CONVERSE”.
The special design includes details like the lining with scattered patterns of the “Chiikawa” and its companions, and the “Star” fastener pull.
Equipped with a front pocket and side pocket with ample storage capacity, and inside, a PC pocket and mesh pocket with cushioning material, offering exceptional usability.
The size is neither too big nor too small, making it perfect for commuting and school, and can be used by everyone from children to adults, regardless of gender.

Size: Approximately H400×W260×D170mm
Material: Polyester
Manufacturing location: China

name: Chiikawa Backpack Makeup Set
description:
A cosmetic set perfect for kids who have awakened to fashion. It also includes a puffy and cute name charm ♪ Ideal for personal use or as a present ♪ Take your cute Bag and go out!
【Set Contents】1 Backpack, 1 Lip Gloss, 1 Lipstick, 3 Water-Soluble Nail Colors, 1 Fake Nail, 1 Name Charm
※ Target age: 6 years and older ※ The length of the backpack straps can be adjusted. ※ When removing makeup, do not use makeup remover, but wash it off with water or lukewarm water. ※ Since the nail color is water-soluble, it can be removed with water without using makeup remover. When removing, please gently rub the nails with water or lukewarm water.
Size: Approx. H230×W200×D70mm Content Volume: Lip Gloss 6mL, Lipstick 1.5g×1, Water-Soluble Nail Color Total 5mL Weight: Approx. 187g Material: PVC, PP, PE, PET, ABS, Nylon, Paper Manufactured in: ChinaFor inquiries about the product Inquiry: (Co.) Lace (0800-222-0425)
【Full Ingredients】 ① Lip Gloss: Polybutene, Mineral Oil, Palmitic Acid Ethylhexyl, Glycerin, Ozokerite, Vegetable Oil, Methylparaben, PET, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Water-soluble Palm Oil Fatty Acid, Stearic Acid Stearyl, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Acetylated Lanolin, Red 201, Red 202 ② Lipstick: Mineral Oil, Palmitic Acid Ethylhexyl, Polybutene, Ozokerite, Tri (Caprylic/Capric Acid) Glyceride, Synthetic Wax, Carnuba Wax, Vegetable Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Water-soluble Palm Oil Fatty Acid, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Stearic Acid Stearyl, Acidified Chitan, Acetylated Lanolin, Red 201, Tetra (J-T-Butylhydroxyhydrocinnamate) Pentarythritol, Red 202 ③ Water-Soluble Nail Color (Pink): Water, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Hoe Acid (CA/AL), Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Acidified Chitan, Acidified Suz, Red 227, Yellow 4 ④ Water-Soluble Nail Color (Blue): Water, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Hoe Acid (CA/AL), Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Acidified Chitan, Acidified Suz, Blue 1, Yellow 4 ⑤ Water-Soluble Nail Color (Orange): Water, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Hoe Acid (CA/AL), Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Acidified Chitan, Orange 205, Acidified Suz, Yellow 4

name: Chiikawa SeePo Baby That Converts to Backpack
description:
Sheet case pouch 'seepo' that can also be a rucksack.
To prevent the wet sheet from drying, the inner bag is stored inside the pouch.
It is also compatible with portable sheets sold in packs of 80. Comes with a strap that allows for adjustment.

Size (approx.): H190×W230×D60mm
Weight (approx.): 120g
Material: Main body: Polyester, PVC
Lid: PP
Manufacturing location: China
